name: Paula Nan 1940's-1950
description:
MADE TO ORDER
Ladies Size: 14-16; (US 12-14)          

Bib has scallop detail on neckline and part of side edges. Shoulder straps button to waistband at back. Sides of skirt, at waist, are gathered. Two optional pockets. Scallop detail on bottom edge of skirt.

When going through checkout, please state, in the 'information to merchant' box, what sort of fabric style/pattern, and colour you would like the apron/s made out of. I will do my best to match it. Thank you!

name: Vera Jacqueline  1948-1950
description:
READY MADE- order now, get now.     ONLY ONE (1) IN STOCK     Please see my blog for more photos

Ladies size: 10-12

This is such a retro apron, and also very versatile! 

Vera is a full-circle half apron which is fully reversible, and also has one moon-shaped pocket on each side (total of two pockets) - not to mention the darling wide scallops along the hem! Very cute! The tie-ends are wider then the normal size, and tie into a gorgeous bow at the back.

This apron is made of two contasting Plisse fabrics - one fabric is yellow with tiny white polka dots, and the other is an adorable swirl of colour - please see blog photos. Vera is very stylish and very vintage!

This apron as a 'Looking Lovely' label on it, as I have only recently changed the name of this business.

name: Beverly 1954
description:
MADE TO ORDER (you order, then I make it)
Ladies size: 10, 12, 14, 16, &18

Skirt gathered to waistband. Five (5) V-shaped pockets on bottom edge of skirt - all in contrast fabric and trimmed  with ric rac. A totally unique apron with real 1954 charm!

When going through checkout, please state, in the 'information to merchant' box, what sort of fabric style/pattern and colour you would like the apron/s made out of. I will do my best to match it. Thank you!

name: Shirley Edith    1940's - 1950's
description:
MADE TO ORDER (you order, then I make it)
Ladies 10-12

Full apron. Bib section is mountain-peak style with a halter that buttons at back of neck. V-shapd skirt is slightly gathered to a waistband. Tie-ends. A very, very cute v-shaped pocket with ruffle trim.  There is ruffle trim along bib and skirt sections. Ruffle is optional. Shirley Edith is a darling apron - sooooo vintage!

When going through checkout, please state, in the 'information to merchant' box, what sort of fabric style/pattern, and colour you would like the apron/s made out of. I will get in contact with you and do my best to match it.  Thank you!

name: Nancy Belle  1950's Full Apron
description:
READY MADE                                       ONLY TWO (2) IN STOCK
Ladies size: 10 (would fit a size 12 also)   

You will stand out as a vintage-loving hostess in this gorgeous 1950's full apron!  
This apron would normally be about $50, but on account of the fabric being a fine weave (not the really hard wearing fabric, but like the vintage 'dainty' tea aprons) it is a cheaper price. 
This apron is indeed a 'dainty' style and you will look very cute in it! Nancy Belle features a three gore flared skirt, two adorable pockets with cute ribbon-bow trim, a unique yoke which has ribbon trim on lower edge and which buttons at nape of neck with one press stud. This apron has tie ends at waist. The fabric is red/pink with light pink/flesh polka dots. Contrast binding (matches polka dots) trims all outer edges of apron body.This apron has a 'Looking Lovely' label on it, as I have only recently changed the name of this business.
